Body:
n = 100
rng = np.random.RandomState(42)
x = rng.randn(n, 2)
A = rng.rand(n, 2)
A = A * np.array([1, 4])[(None), :]
M = ot.dist(x, x)
epsilon = 0.5
reg_m = 10
qstable, log = barycenter_unbalanced(A, M, reg=epsilon, reg_m=reg_m, log=
    True, tau=100, method='sinkhorn_stabilized')
q, log = barycenter_unbalanced(A, M, reg=epsilon, reg_m=reg_m, method=
    'sinkhorn', log=True)
np.testing.assert_allclose(q, qstable, atol=1e-05)
